name: MediaKeySystemAccess
description: The MediaKeySystemAccess interface of the EncryptedMediaExtensions API provides access to a Key System for decryption and/or a content protection provider. You can request an instance of this object using the Navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess() method.

refs.name: Encrypted Media Extensions
refs.description: The definition of 'MediaKeySystemAccess' in the 'Encrypted Media Extensions' specification.
